name: Pixel Gun Master
description:
What kind of game is Pixel Gun Master?

Pixel Gunmaster is a roguelike shooter action game about a protagonist who is turned into a demon and goes on a journey to undo his wish.

Craft your own firearms!

Create your own firearms by combining 9 different gun parts, including barrels, stocks, magazines, and buttplates.
Each gun part changes your gun's effectiveness and appearance in real-time!
From sniper shotguns to taser guns with bananas!


Survive the onslaught of enemies

Enemies are pouring in from all directions! Survive until the stage time runs out!


Strategic Stage Selection

Preview the next stage's rewards and choose your path.
Low risk low return? High risk high return? The strategic choice is yours!

A Variety of Warrior Characters

Welsh Kogi isn't the only hero to take on dungeons!
With the update, you'll also be able to meet a variety of other Heroic characters.


Watch out for powerful bosses

The final stages of the region contain powerful bosses.
Find out the pattern and attack to defeat the boss and advance to deeper areas!


Don't give up when you die!

The gold you earn in the game is converted into experience and used to level up.
Level up and challenge deeper mawgul with a more powerful protagonist!


*Pixel Gun Master is an Early Access game*


Stay tuned for more content to come.
